summary: This document contains details regarding Jeffrey Epstein, including personal information, arrest details, and case status. It outlines his physical characteristics, legal status, and the nature of the charges against him, specifically trafficking conspiracy.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary subject of this document, facing charges related to trafficking conspiracy.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is identified with USMS No 76316054.
He was arrested on July 8, 2019, and is awaiting trial.
The document lists his physical characteristics, including being male, white/Hispanic, with brown hair and eyes.
His marital status is noted as single.
The final offense listed is trafficking conspiracy, which is not yet disposed.
